biotools.summary: PlasClass is a tool for easy classification of sequences as either plasmid or chromosomal. For example, it can be used to classify the contigs in a (metagenomic) assembly.

bioschemas.name: PlasClass
bioschemas.summary: PlasClass is a tool for easy classification of sequences as either plasmid or chromosomal. For example, it can be used to classify the contigs in a (metagenomic) assembly.

galaxy.summary: PlasClass is a tool to classify sequences of plasmid or chromosomal origin
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: PlasClass is a tool for easy classification of sequences as either plasmid or chromosomal. For example, it can be used to classify the contigs in a (metagenomic) assembly.
